member.summary: implementation for creating a reCAPTCHA V3 component and binding the response to a model property.
member.param: An expression to be evaluated against the current model.
Your reCAPTCHA sitekey. Get from the admin console.
The name of your Javascript callback function, executed when the user submits a successful response. Response token will be passed to this function.
A name used to provide a detailed break-down of data for your top ten actions in the admin console.
Indicates if the reCAPTCHA badge is visible. NOTE: You are allowed to hide the badge as long as you include the reCAPTCHA branding visibly in the user flow of the page.

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.TagHelpers.RecaptchaV2CheckboxTagHelper.ExpiredCallback
member.summary: The name of your callback function, executed when the reCAPTCHA response expires and the user needs to re-verify.

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.TagHelpers.RecaptchaV2CheckboxTagHelper.ErrorCallback
member.summary: The name of your callback function, executed when reCAPTCHA encounters an error (usually network connectivity) and cannot continue until connectivity is restored. If you specify a function here, you are responsible for informing the user that they should retry.

member.summary: The request is invalid or malformed.

member.name: F:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.ErrorCode.TimeoutOrDuplicate
member.summary: The response is no longer valid: either is too old or has been used previously.

member.name: F:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.RecaptchaType.V2Checkbox
member.summary: The "I'm not a robot" Checkbox requires the user to click a checkbox indicating the user is not a robot. This will either pass the user immediately (with No CAPTCHA) or challenge them to validate whether or not they are human. This is the simplest option to integrate with and only requires two lines of HTML to render the checkbox.

member.name: F:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.RecaptchaType.V3
member.summary: reCAPTCHA v3 allows you to verify if an interaction is legitimate without any user interaction. It is a pure JavaScript API returning a score, giving you the ability to take action in the context of your site: for instance requiring additional factors of authentication, sending a post to moderation, or throttling bots that may be scraping content.

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.VerifyResponse.Success
member.summary: Status of the verification.

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.VerifyResponse.Score
member.summary: (V3 only) The score for this request (0.0 - 1.0).

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.VerifyResponse.Action
member.summary: (V3 only) The action name for this request (important to verify)

member.name: P:Finoaker.Web.Recaptcha.VerifyResponse.Hostname
member.summary: The hostname of the site where the reCAPTCHA was solved.

member.summary: Any errors that were returned in verfication.

member.summary: Timestamp of the challenge load in ISO format.
